title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
We are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to join our growing team in Paris.

**About the role:**
As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. You will work closely with development teams to ensure smooth deployments and high availability of our services.

**Required Skills:**
- 4+ years of experience in DevOps or Site Reliability Engineering
- Strong expertise in AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, CloudFormation)
- Proficiency with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions)
- Infrastructure as Code experience (Terraform, Ansible, CloudFormation)
- Scripting skills (Python, Bash, PowerShell)
- GitOps practices and tools (ArgoCD, Flux)
- DevSecOps mindset and security best practices

**Preferred Skills:**
- Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, Datadog)
- Knowledge of service mesh (Istio, Linkerd)
- Experience with multi-cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP)
- Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) or similar certifications
- Strong understanding of networking and security

**Responsibilities:**
- Design and implement scalable CI/CD pipelines
- Manage and optimize cloud infrastructure on AWS
- Automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration management
- Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions
- Ensure high availability and disaster recovery
- Collaborate with development teams on deployment strategies
- Champion DevSecOps practices and security automation
- Mentor junior team members

**What we offer:**
- Competitive salary and benefits
- Remote-friendly environment
- Learning and development budget
- Modern tech stack
- Agile team culture
